entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
